extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the Angry Birds Backup 2 SDThis tool allows you to backup and restore your Angry Birds Original, Seasons, Rio, Space and Star Wars version game-save to and from your SD card on your Android device.========== Notice! ==========*** It does NOT work on JellyBean. New kernel seems to restrict the SandBox I/O issue. ***1. You MUST finish at least ONE level in the game before backup or restore.2. The backup files are stored at primary external storage (/sdcard). E.g. Galaxy S2, the save files are backup in ROM storage, NOT in SD-card.=============================- No Ad !!!- Free- Compatible with most devices- Compatible with Android 2.1 or above- Support 5 versions of Angry Birds on 1 App- Simple & Easy to use- Small packet size (~90KB)- No Internet access, no worry about leakage

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work with Jelly Bean!
reviews.comment: I used the app with no problem, loved it, but with the upgrade to Jelly Bean, it fails; for that it only gets 3 stars.
reviews.author: Terri Collier

reviews.title: For those who say jellybean doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: If the app says success but it doesn\'t work, go menu>settings >applications >running services and manually kill the angry birds game you\'re trying to restore.  Then run this app again. It\'ll work. Developer : future update idea ... make this apparently kill the angry birds process before restoring.
reviews.author: Jack Schidt

reviews.title: Can\'t back-up to new phone
reviews.comment: Was very satisfied until I changed phones. Tried to copy and paste back-up files from old to new phone in a few different ways with no success. I\'m aware the files are stored internally on the SII. Help! Going from Galaxy S II to Galaxy S III.
reviews.author: Barney McComas

reviews.title: I\'d send an email to you, Frankie, but how?
reviews.comment: Well, I\'m using this app to restore AB scores and settings on my Nexus 7, but it\'s not working. I think it may be because the Nexus has an \"sdcard\" drive instead of \"sdcard0\". Any thoughts? Any workarounds you might suggest?
reviews.author: Peter Basch

reviews.title: It works
reviews.comment: To the dev is it possible you can make this work on the star wars hd version of AB
reviews.author: Lance T Ripper

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: I wish I could give no stars. This app blows just like all the other apps that claim they will backup angry birds progress. Looks like I\'m stuck starting over for the 5th time
reviews.author: J.P. Craig

reviews.title: Cannot work....
reviews.comment: All my 3 stars record gone away....
reviews.author: Benjamin Chiu

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Does not give any indication other then failed.
reviews.author: Sean Moore

reviews.comment: Great app only problem is that you have to rename the backed up file upon restoring to new rom\tOnce you rename the folder play one level then backup then simply copy and past the backup you want to be restored into the folder the app creates. I am assuming this is likely due to a possible loop that happens when the program is running checks for compatibility or something and verifying the integrity of the file too. If this is what is causing it maybe implement a hash reader creator into the process instead of what ever method you are using at the moment. I am just guessing by the way as to possibles
reviews.author: Mach Fiver

reviews.title: Simple, brilliant, easy, perfect
reviews.comment: This is exactly the app I\'ve needed for ages. I was too scared to risk all my hours ( + weeks) of playing with some of the other similar apps, but I needed to free up some space on my LG E-400 (android 2.3.6) and this worked perfectly. It was so simple and straightforward to save my progress (+ I checked it did work following ALL the instructions (i.e. I saved then uninstalled AB Space + Rio. I installed them again from Google Play. I completed one level on each. I restored my previous progress using this app. I think some people have complained because they haven\'t been paying attention to the easy instructions.) Thank you very much Frankie Wong!!
reviews.author: phoe dan

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work.
reviews.comment: Installed on Galaxy Note 17i7. Clicked on backup Space and it gave notice of backup. Clicking restore gave an error message. Any subsequent attempts to backup any version produces no action (clicking buttons does nothing.  One star given so I could post. Actually deserves a zero or lower. Next time spend more time testing before releasing software.
reviews.author: Kurt Bergman

reviews.title: A once-great app is now completely useless.
reviews.comment: Now that Jelly Bean is here, there is no longer any way to backup my progress in Angry Birds. I have to wipe my device due to chronic instability; that means I lose absolutely everything. I had finished almost every single level with three stars; I will not start from scratch. Rovio and your advertisers, you have lost me, PERMANENTLY.
reviews.author: Michael T.

reviews.title: I love this app
reviews.comment: But no jelly ban update
reviews.author: Shyamsundar Gupta

reviews.title: Stopped working after Jelly Bean update
reviews.comment: After I installed Jelly Bean on my Samsung Galaxy S2, the application stopped working. Too bad...
reviews.author: Boris Opa\305\241i\304\207

reviews.title: Didn\'t work for my new phone
reviews.comment: Restore didn\'t work. I played an entire level. New phone has jelly bean OS. Guess I lost all my scores. Most people wanting to restore have a new phone and most new phones have the jelly bean OS.
reviews.author: Russ Hamilton

reviews.title: Backup didn\'t work
reviews.comment: Tested it and it failed.
reviews.author: Zachery McKinney

reviews.title: Backup successful
reviews.comment: Restore.....file not found.  Rubbish, game lost, thanks.
reviews.author: Crono cide

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Nice
reviews.author: Sathyan G

reviews.title: Can\'t back up to SD card on Galaxy S4. PLEASE REFUND!!
reviews.comment: Please refund.  Can\'t back up to SD card on Galaxy S 4..help!!
reviews.author: mark grzeda

reviews.title: Works perfectly
reviews.comment: Copied my scores from android 2.2 to 4.0,3 without any problem
reviews.author: Francisco S\303\241nchez
